Birdbot and Papertron still waited for one of their 3 most hated enemies. L=
ee and Barrymore continued to brutally beat the now unconscious Brown and P=
ink while they both were bleeding to death. White struggled to breath as it=
 was getting harder every second. McGowan and Virgo smiled, waiting for Tri=
nity, while Alba smoked a cigarette. Hazel stares.

Hazel: Well, they can b=
e replaced I suppose. It's easy to find a few idiots.

Bronze: Yes. I just =
wish I could have kicked some ass.

Cerulean: There's too many of them.

Br=
onze: How about we go in?

Hazel: Very good suggestion, Bronze.

Bronze: I'=
m cool.

Hazel walks back into the Chivtron base, followed by Cerulean and =
Bronze. Periwinkle quickly follows after Hazel waves to Termitron and leans=
 against the wall near the entrance with Cerulean, Bronze and Periwinkle. T=
hey started a conversation...
